step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You're placing your hands well. Remember to focus on inhaling through your nose and tightening your whole body.
Great inhale and muscle tightening! Visualize the fluid moving towards your chest as you breathe in.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Keep visualizing pushing fluid out as you release the breath.
Second rep starting well. Ensure you maintain that comfortable posture and hand placement.
Good focus on the inhale and muscle tightening. Remember the visualization cue for fluid movement.
Well done with the exhale and muscle relaxation. Continue to visualize pushing fluid out.
Fantastic job completing the exercise! You consistently followed the instructions for inhaling, exhaling, and muscle engagement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the deep breathing exercise! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your whole body, visualizing fluid moving to your chest. Then, exhale slowly through your mouth while relaxing, visualizing pushing fluid out. Keep up the excellent work!
